Concerning[] that[] I[] ask[] the[] venerables:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[]+ A[] second[] time[] again[] I[] ask:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[]+ A[] third[] time[] again[] I[] ask:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[]+ The[] venerables[] are[] pure[] in[] this,[] therefore[] there[] is[] silence,[] so[] do[] I[] bear[] this[] (in[] mind).[]
